name: The Switcher (g3rwy)
description:
!!!WARNING!!!
Can contain flashing lights!!!

So the game is about you and your ability of switching off enemies.

You can do that using Space or P. If enemies are off, you can walk on them and they can't kill you.

I wanted to pause music everytime other sfx is playing for better recreate real nokia sounds, but i found it very annoying when it stopped playing while i spammed jumping.

Music by me

Font by @somepx

SFX by Eamonn Watt
